elements.name: Login using valid username and password

user input password with "secret_sauce"
user click Login button
user will be directed to the home page

user input username with "standard_user "
user input password with "secret_sauce"
user click Login button
user will be able to see the error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"
